title: Create a Broadcast Change Slackbot
custom_steps:
1. Users in Slackbot channel are notified when a game's broadcaster has been changed.
2. Message reads:

   a. Date | Day | match-up | time (et) , | change
   
   b. 4/6/25 Sun CWS @ DET 1:40 PM ET - CWS, Broadcaster change from CHSN to CHSN+
4/7/25 Mon STL @ PIT 6:40 PM ET	STL - Broadcaster change from FDSNMW to FDSNMWX

title: Admin || Slackbot - Create Request Slackbot Infra
custom_steps: Slackbot channel is created for game requests made within 24 hours of game start.

title: RA + EA || Slackbot - Notify for Unapproved Requests an Hour Before Game Start
custom_steps:
1. A Slackbot notification is sent an hour before Game Start for Games that have...

    a. Have a status of either _pending_ or _engineering_.

    b.AND have one hour left before Game Start.
2. The notification reads: 

"*Requestor* has a request waiting for approval for a game that starts in one hour. 
Status: *status*"

title: RA + EA || Slackbot - Notify for Requests Created Within 24 Hours of Game Start
custom_steps:
1. When a game is requested within 24 hours of the game's Start Time, a Slackbot notification is sent.
2. The notification reads "Requestor has requested *Game* on *Day* at *Time* on Network"

   a.  Day is formatted MM/DD and Time is formatted HH:MM AM/PM ET

title: RA + EA || Slackbot - Change Messaging for Proxy Requests Created Within 24 Hours of Game Start
custom_steps:
1. When a game is requested within 24 hours of the game’s Start Time, a Slackbot notification is sent.

2. The notification reads “user_name has created a request on behalf of Requestor for Game on Day at Time on Network”.

     a. Day is formatted MM/DD and Time is formated HH:MM AM/PM ET

     b. user_name is the name of the requesting Admin user.
